tools.name: coinbase_get_balance
tools.description: Check your Coinbase wallet balance. Use this before sending crypto to verify you have sufficient funds.

currency.description: Specific currency to check (e.g., USDT, BTC). If omitted, returns all balances.

tools.name: coinbase_send_crypto
tools.description: Send crypto from Coinbase to an external wallet address. ALWAYS verify the address before sending. Use this for refilling Rainbet or other platforms.

network.description: Network to use: TRC20, ERC20, or BEP20 (default: TRC20)

tools.name: save_deposit_address
tools.description: Save a crypto deposit address for a platform (e.g., Rainbet) for future use.

network.description: Network: TRC20, ERC20, or BEP20 (default: TRC20)

tools.name: get_deposit_address
tools.description: Get a saved crypto deposit address for a platform. Use this to check if an address is already saved before asking the user.

platform.description: Platform name (e.g., rainbet). If omitted, returns all saved addresses.
